use.flag: Copy authserver and worldserver .conf.dist files to the project dir
Enable detailed metrics reporting (i.e. time each session takes to update)
Disable the GIT testing routines. Only for git 9999 version.
Use precompiled headers when compiling scripts
Use precompiled headers when compiling servers
Enable strict checking of database field value accessors
Disable metrics reporting (i.e. InfluxDB and Grafana)
